# Magic Falls Rafting Company

White Water Rafting on the Kennebec River in Maine 

## Contact
Address: 38 Dead River Rd, West Forks, ME 04985
Website: https://magicfalls.com/


## Why Go here?

Troop 750 highly recommends - families go too!
